name: Crazy Breakout
description: "Crazy Break-Out is a variation of the traditional break-out game where the objective is to release balls from chains instead of destroying them with a ball and paddle. As the player progresses through the game, they must free more and more balls, leading to a more hectic and fast-paced gameplay experience. To excel at this game, players will need to have fast reflexes and be able to think strategically to take advantage of the multiple balls bouncing on the screen. Do you think you have what it takes to conquer this exciting and difficult game? Give it a try and find out!"
